overview: Archeologists William and Elizabeth Reuter are busy working in the forbidden ruins of Abu-Sir. They discover the treasure map of the pyramid, which leads them to an ancient sarcophagus containing the Egyptian goddess Amira, who is magically alive after 4,000 years. She recounts the days of her sex life with the pharaoh.
tagline: Filmed exclusively on location in Egypt, on an unheard of budget of $1 million dollars.
title: The Pyramid
